text: Namoota irraa nama “Rabbitti amanneerra” jedhaa yeroo karaa Rabbii keessatti rakkifame, rakkina namni isa irratti raawwatu akka adabbii Rabbii taasisutu jiraYoo injifannoon Rabbii kee irraa dhufes dhugumatti “nuti isinii wajjin turre” jedhuSila Allaahn waan qoma aalamaa keessa jiru akkaan beekaa hin taanee
